name: Headdress
description: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.

abilities.name: Regeneration Aura
abilities.description: Increases the health regeneration of nearby allies.
notes: Can regenerate up to 120 health in one minute

additionalInfo: With Regeneration Aura, the item grants a total of 2.5 health regeneration to the wielder
trivia: In DotA, this item is named Headdress of Rejuvenation

recentChanges.description: No longer builds into Holy Locket
